Angular Annotorious Examples

Use these examples as a way to quickly start any new web project that requires image annotation.

Basic Annotation

Hover the image and annotate to your heart contents

Annotation with ColorBox

Click the thumbnail image and annotate to your heart contents

Annotation modal example with Width/Height 75%

Annotorious in Colorbox Gallery

Click a thumbnail image then click over the large image.
